channel.title: CVE Feed for sulu -- sulu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sulu -- sulu

item.title: CVE-2024-47618|2024-10-03T14:18:02.129Z -- sulu -- sulu
item.description: Sulu is a PHP content management system. Sulu is vulnerable against XSS whereas a low privileged user with access to the “Media” section can upload an SVG file with a malicious payload. Once uploaded and accessed, the malicious javascript will be executed on the victims’ (other users including admins) browsers. This issue is fixed in 2.6.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-47617|2024-10-03T14:24:44.300Z -- sulu -- sulu
item.description: Sulu is a PHP content management system. This vulnerability allows an attacker to inject arbitrary HTML/JavaScript code through the media download URL in Sulu CMS. It affects the SuluMediaBundle component. The vulnerability is a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) issue, which could potentially allow attackers to steal sensitive information, manipulate the website's content, or perform actions on behalf of the victim. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.6.5 and 2.5.21.
